EigenMeat.EigenMaze
Interface MobileEntity

All Superinterfaces:
Drawable
All Known Implementing Classes:
Entity
public interface MobileEntity
extends Drawable

Classifies an object as a movable game entity.

Method Summary

          Check this entity for collisions with another movable entity.

Tests if this entity is dead.

Returns:

Parameters:

setTimedDeath

public void setTimedDeath(int life)
Sets the death timer for this entity.

Parameters:
life - the lifetime in milliseconds to set the timer to.

die

public void die()
Kills this entity. The entity's specific death actions will be taken, and the entity will cease to exist in the game world.

checkCollision

public boolean checkCollision(MobileEntity entity)
Check this entity for collisions with another movable entity. This is currently deprecated.

Parameters:
entity - the entity to check collision against.
Returns:
true if this entity will collide with the other entity during the next update; false otherwise.
See Also:
Physics.checkSphereCollision(Vect3d, float, Vect3d, float)

collide

public boolean collide(MobileEntity entity)
This function is called when the entity collides with something.

Parameters:
entity - the entity that current entity collided with (null if collided with wall)
